response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it's time to share this unique asset with someone who can appreciate its true worth. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding investment opportunity. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are confident that together, we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
